title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
nner Sanctum. Shadowheart is now very close to proving herself to Shar and becoming a Dark Justiciar. We should accompany her downwards. We have surmounted all the trials and cleared the way to the Inner Sanctum. Shadowheart is now very close to proving herself to Shar and becoming a Dark Justiciar. We should accompany her downwards.

When you are ready, step on the newly activated platform ahead. Enter the Inner Sanctum to reach your next objective.
